headline: Festive Fares: Agoda Reveals Asia's Most Affordable Year-End Flight Routes for Holiday Travelers
summary: As the year-end holiday season approaches, digital travel platform Agoda reveals the most affordable domestic and international flight routes across Asia. The list offers travelers insights into the routes that could offer a chance to celebrate without breaking the bank. Based on bookings made from September 2025 onwards for departures between December 20-31, Agoda reveals Thailand was the top destination for budget-friendly domestic flights, with fares starting as low as 6 USD.
